textEng: A bad compromise is better than a good lawsuit
A bad workman always blames his tools
A bag of bones
A bargain is a bargain
A bird may be known by its song
A black hen lays a white egg

textUkr: Не було б щастя, так нещастя допомогло
textEng: A blessing in disguise

textUkr: Любиш кататися - люби і саночки возити
textEng: A cat in gloves catches no mice
A cat with nine lives
A chain is no stronger than its weakest link
A creaking door hangs long on its hinges
A dog in the manger
A drop in the bucket [ocean]
A fly in the ointment
A friend in need is a friend indeed

textUkr: Краще гірка правда, ніж солодка брехня
textEng: A friend's frown is better than a foe's smile

textUkr: Краще синиця в жмені, ніж журавель в небі
textEng: A gift in the hand is better than two promises
A great ship asks deep waters

textUkr: Кінь на чотирьох ногах - і то спотикається
textEng: A horse stumbles that has four legs
A little bird told me

textUkr: Скажи мені, хто твій друг, і я скажу, хто ти
textEng: A man is known by the company he keeps
A miss is as good as a mile
A piece of the churchyard fits everybody

textUkr: Камінь, що котиться, мохом не обростає
textEng: A rolling stone gathers no moss
A sound mind in a sound body
A storm in a tea-cup

textUkr: Слово - не горобець, вилетить - не спіймаєш
textEng: A word spoken is past recalling

textUkr: Не по словах судять, а по ділах
textEng: Actions speak louder than words
Add fuel to the fire
After death the doctor
All cats are grey in the dark
All is not gold that glitters
All is well that ends well
All weeds grow apace
Although the sun shines, leave not thy cloak at home
An ox is taken by the horns, and the man by the tongue
Appetite comes with the eating
As bold as brass
As like as two peas
As old as the hills
As pale as a ghost

textUkr: Тепло, світло і мухи не кусають
textEng: As snug as a bug in a rug
As you sow, so you reap
At home even the walls help
At the ends of the earth
Bad news has wings
Bad news travels quickly
Baker's dozen

textUkr: Бути не в своїй тарілці (почуватися незручно)
textEng: Be in the wrong box

textUkr: Сам живи й іншим не заважай
textEng: Bear and forbear
Beauty is only [but] skin deep
Before one can say Jack Robinson
Before you know where you are
Best defense is offence
Better a lean jade than an empty halter
Better a little fire to warm us, than a great one to burn us

textUkr: Не родися красивим, а родися щасливим
textEng: Better be born lucky than rich

textUkr: Краще бути першим серед останніх, ніж останнім серед перших
textEng: Better be the head of a dog, than the tail of a lion

textUkr: Краще вмерти стоячи, ніж жити на колінах
textEng: Better die standing than live kneeling
Better late than never
Better one-eyed than stone-blind
Between the upper and nether millstone
Betwixt and between
Birds of feather flock together
Blind men can judge no colors

textUkr: Істинні друзі, як і мудрі книги - рідкість
textEng: Books and friends should be few but good
Boys will be boys
By hook or by crook
Call a spade a spade
Cat-and-dog life

textUkr: Хто в ліс, хто по дрова
textEng: Cat's concert
Charity begins at home
Claw me, and I'll claw thee
Cleanliness is next to godliness
Constant dropping wears away a stone

textUkr: Не знаєш броду, не лізь у воду
textEng: Cross the stream where it is shallowest
Curiosity killed the cat

textUkr: Не рий іншому яму - сам в неї впадеш
textEng: Curses like chickens come home to roost
Custom is a second nature
Cut from the same cloth

textUkr: Якби знав, де впадеш, соломинки б підстелив
textEng: Danger foreseen is half avoided
Deaf as an adder [a beetle, a post, a stone]
Deeds, not words
Divide and rule!
Do not kick against the pricks
Do not wash your dirty linen in public

textUkr: Не рубай гілку, на якій сидиш
textEng: Don't cut the bough you are standing on

textUkr: Поки грім не гряне, чоловік не перехреститься
textEng: Don't have thy cloak to make when it begins to rain

textUkr: Дарованому коневі в зуби не заглядають
textEng: Don't look a gift horse in the mouth
Don't make a mountain out of a molehill
Don't play with fire

textUkr: Не плюй в криницю - прийдеться води напитися
textEng: Don't quarrel with your bread and butter
Don't strike a man when he is down
Don't swap horses when crossing a stream
Don't teach fishes to swim
Don't teach your grandmother to suck eggs

textUkr: Не буди лиха, поки лихо спить
textEng: Don't trouble your trouble until your trouble troubles you

textUkr: Що у п'яного на язиці, те у тверезого в голові
textEng: Drunkenness reveals what soberness conceals

textUkr: В гостях добре, а вдома - краще
textEng: Dry bread at home is better than roast meat abroad

textUkr: Хто рано встає, тому Бог дає
textEng: Early to bed and early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise
East or west, home is best
Easy come, easy go

textUkr: Їж вволю, а пий в міру
textEng: Eat at pleasure, drink with measure
Empty vessels make the greatest sound
Every barber knows that
Every bullet has its billet

textUkr: Закон - як дишло, куди повернеш - туди й вийшло
textEng: Every law has a loophole

textUkr: Сивина в бороду, а біс в ребро
textEng: Every man is a fool or a physician at forty
Everything is good in its season
Evil communications corrupt good manners
Extremes meet
Fear has magnifying eyes
Fish begins to stink at the head
Fools rush in where angels fear to tread
For a rainy day
Forbidden fruit is sweetest
Fortune favours fools
From smoke into smother

textUkr: Від великого до смішного - один крок
textEng: From tile sublime to the ridiculous is but a step
Fussy as a hen with one chick

textUkr: Застав дурня Богу молитися, так він лоб розіб'є
textEng: Give a fool rope enough, and he will hang himself

textUkr: Дай йому палець, а він хоче всю руку
textEng: Give him an inch and he'll take a mile

textUkr: Не сунь носа в чужі справи
textEng: Go home and say your prayers
Good fences make good neighbours
Good health is above wealth
Great boast, small roast
Habit cures habit
Hard put for a livelihood
Hawk will not pick out hawks' eyes
He can't say "boo" to a goose
He is an obstinate pig
He is not quite all there

textUkr: Добре сміється той, хто сміється останнім
textEng: He laughs best who laughs last

textUkr: Двом смертям не бувати, а одної не минути
textEng: He that fears death lives not

textUkr: Вовків боятися - в ліс не ходити
textEng: He that fears every bush must never go a-birding
He that has a great nose thinks everybody is speaking of it

textUkr: Не помиляється той, хто нічого не робить
textEng: He that never climbed never fell

textUkr: Хто платить, той і музику замовляє
textEng: He that pays the piper calls the tune

textUkr: Любиш кататися - люби і саночки возити
textEng: He that would have eggs must endure the cackling of hens
He who pleased everybody died before he was born
History repeats itself
Hope springs eternal in the human breast

textUkr: З ким поведешся, того й наберешся
textEng: If you lie down with dogs, will get up with fleas

textUkr: За двома зайцями поженешся - жодного не піймаєш
textEng: If you run after two hares, you'll catch none
If you want peace, prepare for war

textUkr: В одне вухо влетіло, в друге - вилетіло
textEng: In at one ear and out at the other
It goes without saying
It is easier to pull down than to build
It is Greek [Hebrew] to me
It is love that makes the world go round
It is never too late to learn
It is no use crying over spilt milk

textUkr: Не місце красить людину, а людина місце
textEng: It is not the places that grace the men, but men the places
It rains cats and dogs
It's a small world
It's enough to make a cat laugh
Joking apart

textUkr: Ще молоко на губах не обсохло
textEng: Just out of swaddling-clothes
Keep your fingers crossed!

textUkr: Син рибака з дитинства у воду дивиться
textEng: Know the breed, know the dog
Lead-pipe cinch
Learn to crawl before you walk [run]
Left-handed to no profession

textUkr: Яблуко від яблуні не далеко падає
textEng: Like father, like son
Like greased lightning
Like water of a duck's back
Little things amuse [please] little minds
Live and learn
Love cannot be forced
Love is blind

textUkr: Не везе в картах - повезе в коханні
textEng: Lucky at cards, unlucky in love
Make hay while the sun shines
Man does not live by bread alone
Many words will not fill a bushel

textUkr: Око за око, зуб за зуб
textEng: Measure for measure
Might goes before right
Might is right
Minutes make hours
Misfortunes never come alone
Money has no smell
Money makes money
More haste, less speed
Much ado about nothing
Mute as a fish
My house is my castle
Necessity is the mother of invention
Neck or nothing
Neither here nor there

textUkr: Ніколи не відкладай на завтра те, що можеш зробити сьогодні
textEng: Never put otill tomorrow what you can do today
New lords, new laws

textUkr: Йому палець в рот не клади
textEng: No flies on him
No flying from fate
No man can serve two masters
No news is good news
Not a pin to choose between them
Not all that glitters is gold
Nothing comes out of the sack but what was in it
Nothing hurts like the truth

textUkr: Під лежачий камінь вода не тече
textEng: Nothing seek, nothing find
Nothing venture, nothing gained
Old friends and old wine are best
One must draw the line somewhere
One swallow doesn't make a summer
Over my dead body!
Packed like herrings
Poverty is no sin
Practice makes perfect
Promises are like piecrust, made to be broken
Proud as a peacock
Pull up stakes
Punctuality is the politeness of kings
Put that in your pipe and smoke it
Rain at seven, fine at eleven
Rats desert a sinking ship
Respect is greater from a distance

textUkr: Хто сам себе не поважає, того й інші поважати не будуть
textEng: Respect yourself, or no one else will respect you
Revenge is sweet

textUkr: Послуга за послугу. Я тобі - ти мені
textEng: Roll my log and I'll roll yours
Rome was not built in a day
Saying and doing are two things

textUkr: Сім разів відміряй, один раз відріж
textEng: Score twice before you cut once

textUkr: Сім раз відміряй, один раз відріж
textEng: Second thoughts are best
Silence gives consent
Slow help is no help
Small rain lays great dust
So many men, so many minds
Speech is silver, but silence is gold
Still waters run deep
Store is no sore
Strike while the iron is hot
Take the bull by the horns
Take the knock
Talk of the devil and he is sure to appear
Tastes differ
That cock won't fight
That's where the shoe pinches
The best is often the enemy of the good
The cat would eat fish and would not wet her feet
The cobbler's wife is the worst shod

textUkr: Що маємо - не бережемо, а втративши - плачемо
textEng: The cow knows not the worth of her tail till she loses it

textUkr: Не такий чорт страшний, як його малюють
textEng: The devil is not so black as he is painted
The dogs bark, but the caravan goes on

textUkr: Хто рано встає, тому Бог дає
textEng: The early bird catches the worm
The end crowns the work
The end justifies the means
The exception proves the rule
The falling out of lovers is the renewing of love
The game is not worth the candle
The grass is always greener on the other side of the fence

textUkr: Як вовка не корми, він все одно в ліс дивиться
textEng: The leopard cannot change his sports
The less people think, the more they talk

textUkr: В тісноті, та не в обіді
textEng: The more the merrier
The nearer the bone, the sweeter the flesh [the meat]
The person always christens his own child first

textUkr: Чи я би корова мичала, а твоя би мовчала
textEng: The pot calls the kettle black

textUkr: Благими намірами вимощена дорога в пекло
textEng: The road to hell is paved with good intentions
The wind cannot be caught in a net
There is a black sheep in every flock
There is a small choice in rotten apples
There is life in the old dog yet
There is many a slip between the cup and the lip
There is no rose without a thorn
There is no smoke without fire
There is safety in numbers

textUkr: Це ні в які ворота не лізе
textEng: This is out of all notch

textUkr: Якщо хочеш собі добра, нікому не роби зла
textEng: Those who live in glass houses should not throw stones
Time flies
Time is money
To be up to the ears in love
To cudgel one's brains
To dance to somebody's tune

textUkr: Пройти крізь вогонь, воду і мідні труби
textEng: To go through fire and water [through thick and thin]
To have one's head in the clouds
To have rats in the attic
To keep Saint Monday
To kick the bucket

textUkr: Знати все - значить нічого не знати
textEng: To know everything is to know nothing
To lead [ to give] somebody a dance
To look for a pin's head in a cartload of hay
To shove in one's face
To sleep on a volcano
To stew in one's juice
To whistle for a wind

textUkr: Де дві господині, там хата неметена
textEng: Too many cooks spoil the broth
Too much knowledge makes the head bald
Too much pudding will choke a dog
Truth comes out of the mouths of babes and suckling
Truth will out
Wait and see
Walk on air
Walls have ears
We shall see what we shall see

textUkr: Чого не можна вилікувати, те приходиться терпіти
textEng: What can't be cured must be endured

textUkr: Що має трапитися, те й буде
textEng: What must be, must be

textUkr: Що кого болить, той про це й кричить
textEng: What the heart thinks the tongue speaks
When Greek meets Greek then comes the tug of war
When in Rome, do as the Romans do
When pigs fly

textUkr: Мудрий вчиться на чужих помилках, а дурень - на своїх
textEng: Wise men learn by other men's mistakes; fools by their own
With time and patience the leaf of the mulberry becomes satin
You never know what you can do till you try
